aboutPartOne: Thullo is web application for managing teams workflow. It is developed in scope of programming challenge which is provided by <tag>{{link}}</tag> resource. It is inspired by original Trello team management web application.
aboutPartThree: Check original <tag>{{link}}</tag> web application as well.
thulloTitleText: Thullo helps teams move work forward.
thulloDescriptionText: Collaborate, manage projects, and reach new productivity peaks. From high rises to the home office, the way your team works is unique—accomplish it all with Thullo.
